## Vehicle Equipment Installation/Removal Services - St. John’s, NL
### Request for Standing Offer Notice ID: cb-925-95116357

#### General Information

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has issued a Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for the provision of labour, materials, and supervision necessary to install and remove police emergency equipment, safety equipment, and radio/communication equipment on RCMP vehicles in the St. John’s area of Newfoundland and Labrador. The services are required on an “as and when” requested basis in accordance with the terms and conditions detailed within the solicitation document.

#### Service Requirements

The requirement includes the provision of an outdoor storage compound on the site of the contractor’s installation facility in Newfoundland and Labrador, within a 100-kilometer radius of St. John’s, NL. The storage compound must have the capacity to store a minimum of 8 RCMP vehicles at any one time. The number of vehicles requiring storage will fluctuate.

It is anticipated that the RCMP will engage multiple contractors in the St. John’s area. The number of vehicles built and stored at each site will depend on the number of successful Offerors and their capacity. The standing offer period will be for a 12-month period, with 3 additional 12-month options to extend.

#### Bidding Information

The RCMP invites bids from qualified suppliers to provide the required services. The basis of selection will be lowest price. Multiple standing offers may be issued as a result of this RFSO.

Tenders must be submitted electronically to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. The solicitation documents and related information are available for download on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

#### Security Requirements

There is a security requirement associated with the Standing Offer. The supplier must have a valid Canadian Controlled Goods Program (CCGP) Cybersecurity Clearance.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria for this RFSO include:

* Mandatory technical evaluation criteria
* Complying with the requirements of the RFSO
* Price-based evaluation

#### Important Note

Canada will make available Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations, and related documents for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS). Canada is not responsible for the information found on websites of third parties.
